data.name: Revolution 25th Anniversary Documentary
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

A comprehensive series of movies offering an in-depth history both of Revolution and their games, over a 25 year journey. Enjoy unique insights from the creative minds who have taken part, from Lure of the Temptress in 1992 to their latest title Broken Sword 5 - the Serpent’s Curse. Dave Gibbons recalls working on Beneath a Steel Sky, whilst Charles Cecil looks back on what influenced him to create George, Nico and the Broken Sword universe. Discover the trials and tribulations faced and how Revolution has survived and thrived over the course of a quarter century of adventure game development. An essential watch for all fans of the genre.

An essential watch for all fans of the genre.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
